column5: Hey all.  So my wife says to me this morning that I can skip the plans for Sunday and go fishing as part of my fathers day gift.  So I'm going to my folks place on 4 mile lake tomorrow and I should be there just before lunch.  So if anyone that hasn't fished the lake and has a boat and would like to follow me around in my boat feel free to PM me with your info.  I'll show you where to go and try.  Sinclair already stole the one seat in my boat when he noticed my status update, but I can fit a 3rd in a tight space if you want to come too.  Let me know if you are interested.  Geoff
That is a great offer Geoff, I wish I could take you up on it...but I snuck away the last few weekends and I'm on honey do list duty tomorrow.
If I wasn't back in hospital tour mode again I'd join ya Geoff. Might be able to show you a thing or 2 about that lake.  Another time.
Fathers day is still a week away Geoff, cancel tomorrow and come up to Lakair next weekend.....
Joe told me, sorry to hear Will.  And yes, if there are any tricks you think I don't know about it I'm ready to go!  I would BUT my kids have plans for me and I need the cash for another purchase
hum, must have missed the multi quote... either way, another time then Greg.
Iwish I could but I promised my daugter that her canoe would be ready for the long wknd and I stiil have 15 -20 hrs to put into it. Canoe tomoro.  Good luck.  Thanks for the info.
car is packed and Sin's got the addy (in a min via pm) so report to follow tomorrow even if we don't get what we are after.
